button

basic

구분 xsmall small medium large xlarge
disable ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR
slightly ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR
normal ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR
weighty ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR
weightiest ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR ANCHOR

btn etc

btn.next btn.more

markup

<!-- btn etc -->
<a class="btn large weighty next" href="javascript:void(0);">btn.next</a>
<a class="btn xlarge weightiest more" href="javascript:void(0);">btn.more</a>

btn small example

ANCHOR

markup

<!-- btn small -->
<a class="btn small normal" href="javascript:void(0);">ANCHOR</a>
<input class="btn small normal" type="submit" value="INPUT" />
<button class="btn small normal" type="button">BUTTON</button>

btn large example

ANCHOR

markup

<!-- btn large -->
<a class="btn large normal" href="javascript:void(0);">ANCHOR</a>
<input class="btn large normal" type="submit" value="INPUT" />
<button class="btn large normal" type="button">BUTTON</button>

align center

중앙정렬 중앙정렬

markup

<!-- button-aera -->
<div class="button-area large">
	<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">중앙정렬</a>
	<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">중앙정렬</a>
</div>
<!-- //button-aera -->

align right

우측정렬 우측정렬

markup

<!-- button-aera -->
<div class="button-area large">
	<span>
		<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">우측정렬</a>
		<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">우측정렬</a>
	</span>
</div>
<!-- //button-aera -->

align left

우측정렬 우측정렬 좌측정렬 좌측정렬

markup

<!-- button-aera -->
<div class="button-area large">
	<span>
		<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">우측정렬</a>
		<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">우측정렬</a>
	</span>
	<span>
		<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">좌측정렬</a>
		<a class="btn medium normal" href="javascript:void(0);">좌측정렬</a>
	</span>
</div>
<!-- //button-aera -->

etc

등록순 조회순 댓글순
페이스북 내보내기 트위터 내보내기 블로그 내보내기
1:1 친절상담 바로 가기
좋아요 좋아요

markup

<!-- button-aera -->
<div class="button-area sort">
	<span>
		<a class="btn register active univ-after" href="javascript:void(0);">등록순</a>
		<a class="btn view univ-after" href="javascript:void(0);">조회순</a>
		<a class="btn comment univ-after" href="javascript:void(0);">댓글순</a>
	</span>
</div>
<!-- //button-aera -->
<!-- aside -->
<div class="aside sns">
	<a class="btn export facebook univ-after" href="javascript:void(0);">페이스북 내보내기</a>
	<a class="btn export twitter univ-after" href="javascript:void(0);">트위터 내보내기</a>
	<a class="btn export blog univ-after" href="javascript:void(0);">블로그 내보내기</a>
</div>
<!-- //aside -->
<!-- aside -->
<div class="aside">
	<a class="btn direct" href="javascript:void(0);">1:1 친절상담 바로 가기</a>
</div>
<!-- //aside -->
